text: Vito Andolini Corleone (born Vito Andolini in Corleone, Province of Palermo, Sicily, Italy) is a fictional character in Mario Puzo's novel The Godfather and in Francis Ford Coppola's first two movies, where he was portrayed by Marlon Brando in The Godfather and, as a younger man, by Robert De Niro in The Godfather Part II. ==Other websites== * Vito Corleone on The Godfather Wiki Category:Fictional criminals Category:Movie characters
title: Vito Corleone
